verses.verse: You are righteous, <WH6662> Yahweh, <WH3068> when I contend <WH7378> with you; <WH1696> yet I would reason the cause <WH4941> with you: <WH1870> why does the way of the wicked <WH7563> prosper? <WH6743> why are all they at ease <WH7951> who deal very <WH899> treacherously? <WH898>
